entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
